inputs.name: avConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure DevOps service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure DevOps Organization service connection that should be used to connect to Azure DevOps

inputs.name: avProject
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the team project were the pipeline resides.

inputs.name: avBuildDefinition
inputs.label: Build Definition
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the Build to trigger.

inputs.name: avReleaseDefinition
inputs.label: Release Definition
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the Release to trigger.

inputs.name: avBranch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the branch to build. When kept empty the default branch of the build will be used.

inputs.name: avBuildNumber
inputs.label: Build Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The succeeded build number to release of the primary artifact. When kept empty the latest version is used.

inputs.name: avAsync
inputs.label: Async
inputs.helpMarkDown: The async flag defines whether the build task waits till the builds are finished or just queues them.

inputs.name: avPipelineIdOutputVariable
inputs.label: Pipeline Id Output Variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: Variable name used to write the resulting build/release id's.
